channel.title: How does the country as a whole benefit from an event held in a specific place?
channel.description: I couldn't come up with much logical and reasonable answers, Mind if anyone helps..?

item.title: How does the country as a whole benefit from an event held in a specific place?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:5, topic:366511”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=462716.msg3384849#msg3384849 date=1288373398]
I guess AIDs?
[/quote]It could raise the amount of people infected with AIDs due to this actually being based on India/South Africa of which both already has a high amount of people infected with HIV/AIDs but that’s not what I’m looking for It has to benefit the country.[/quote]To a point it has…They get all that AID’s money from donations to help out there life while battling AID’s.

Read full topic

item.title: How does the country as a whole benefit from an event held in a specific place?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Define “event”? Do you mean a event such as the olympics? If so they benefit from it economically due to more money comes in from tourism, and building work can boost the industry. Also, the global spot light is focused on their country which can be good, and bad.

If you don’t mean that, then elaborate.

Read full topic
